title.@value: Medication or substance that is known to be contraindicated for the patient without injury or harm

definition.@value: Prescription or non-prescription drug or other substance that has a medical reason for why it should not be used that is administered and does not result in injury or harm.

label.@value: Medication or substance that is known to be an allergen without injury or harm
Medication or substance that is known to be contraindicated for the patient, as mode of injury or harm
Medication or substance that is known to be contraindicated for the patient without injury or harm
